_data Struct Reference

This struct stores information to an HTTP request or response. Both HTTP Headers and HTTP body data are stored under this struct. More...

#include <HTTP.h>


Data Fields

char * Header
unsigned int HeaderSize
char * Data
unsigned int DataSize

Detailed Description

This struct stores information to an HTTP request or response. Both HTTP Headers and HTTP body data are stored under this struct.

Definition at line 97 of file HTTP.h.

Field Documentation

char* _data::Header

Pointer to a null terminated string that stores the HTTP Headers.
